verses.verse: "Bring <WH7126> Aaron <WH175> your brother, <WH251> and his sons <WH1121> with him, <WH8432> near to you from among the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that he may minister to me in the priest <WH3547>'s office, even Aaron, <WH175> Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu, <WH30> Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar, <WH385> Aaron <WH175>'s sons. <WH1121>
You shall make <WH6213> holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175> your brother, <WH251> for glory <WH3519> and for beauty. <WH8597>

You shall speak <WH1696> to all who are wise <WH2450> hearted, <WH3820> whom I have filled <WH4390> with the spirit <WH7307> of wisdom, <WH2451> that they make <WH6213> Aaron <WH175>'s garments <WH899> to sanctify <WH6942> him, <WH3547> that he may minister to me in the priest's office.

These are the garments <WH899> which they shall make: <WH6213> a breastplate, <WH2833> and an ephod, <WH646> and a robe, <WH4598> and a coat <WH3801> of checker work, <WH8665> a turban, <WH4701> and a sash: <WH73> and they shall make <WH6213> holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175> your brother, <WH251> and his sons, <WH1121> that he may minister to me in the priest <WH3547>'s office.
They shall take <WH3947> the gold, <WH2091> and the blue, <WH8504> and the purple, <WH713> and the scarlet, <WH8144> and the fine linen. <WH8336>

"They shall make <WH6213> the ephod <WH646> of gold, <WH2091> of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> scarlet, <WH8144> and fine twined <WH7806> linen, <WH8336> the work <WH4639> of the skillful workman. <WH2803>
It shall have two <WH8147> shoulder <WH3802> straps joined <WH2266> to the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of it, <WH2266> that it may be joined together.

The skillfully woven band, <WH2805> which is on it, <WH642> that is on him, <WH4639> shall be like its work and of the same piece; <WH2091> of gold, of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8144> and fine twined <WH7806> linen. <WH8336>
You shall take <WH3947> two <WH8147> onyx <WH7718> stones, <WH68> and engrave <WH6605> on them the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>

six <WH8337> of their names <WH8034> on the one <WH259> stone, <WH68> and the names <WH8034> of the six <WH8337> that remain <WH3498> on the other <WH8145> stone, <WH68> in the order of their birth. <WH8435>

With the work <WH4639> of an engraver <WH2796> in stone, <WH68> like the engravings <WH6603> of a signet, <WH2368> you shall engrave <WH6605> the two <WH8147> stones, <WH68> according to the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> you shall make <WH6213> them to be enclosed <WH4142> in settings <WH4865> of gold. <WH2091>

You shall put <WH7760> the two <WH8147> stones <WH68> on the shoulder <WH3802> straps of the ephod, <WH646> to be stones <WH68> of memorial <WH2146> for the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> and Aaron <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> their names <WH8034> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> on his two <WH8147> shoulders <WH3802> for a memorial. <WH2146>
You shall make <WH6213> settings <WH4865> of gold, <WH2091>

and two <WH8147> chains <WH8333> of pure <WH2889> gold; <WH2091> you shall make <WH6213> them like cords <WH4020> of braided <WH5688> work: <WH4639> and you shall put <WH5414> the braided <WH5688> chains <WH8333> on the settings. <WH4865>

"You shall make <WH6213> a breastplate <WH2833> of judgment, <WH4941> the work <WH4639> of the skillful <WH2803> workman; <WH4639> like the work of the ephod <WH646> you shall make <WH6213> it; <WH2091> of gold, of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8144> and fine twined <WH7806> linen, <WH8336> you shall make it. <WH6213>
It shall be square <WH7251> and folded <WH3717> double; <WH2239> a span shall be its length <WH753> of it, <WH2239> and a span its breadth. <WH7341>

You shall set <WH4390> in it settings <WH4396> of stones, <WH68> four <WH702> rows <WH2905> of stones: <WH68> a row <WH2905> of ruby, <WH124> topaz, <WH6357> and beryl <WH1304> shall be the first <WH259> row; <WH2905>
and the second <WH8145> row <WH2905> a turquoise, <WH3095> a sapphire, <WH5601> and an emerald; <WH5306>
and the third <WH7992> row <WH2905> a jacinth, <WH3958> an agate, <WH7618> and an amethyst; <WH306>
and the fourth <WH7243> row <WH2905> a chrysolite, <WH8658> an onyx, <WH7718> and a jasper: <WH3471> they shall be enclosed <WH7660> in gold <WH2091> in their settings. <WH4396>

The stones <WH68> shall be according to the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> twelve, <WH8147> according to their names; <WH8034> like the engravings <WH6603> of a signet, <WH2368> everyone <WH376> according to his name, <WH8034> they shall be for the twelve <WH8147> tribes. <WH7626>
You shall make <WH6213> on the breastplate <WH2833> chains <WH8331> like cords, <WH1383> of braided <WH5688> work <WH4639> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>

You shall make <WH6213> on the breastplate <WH2833> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold, <WH2091> and shall put <WH5414> the two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> on the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the breastplate. <WH2833>
You shall put <WH5414> the two <WH8147> braided <WH5688> chains of gold <WH2091> in the two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> at the ends <WH7098> of the breastplate. <WH2833>

The other two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the two <WH8147> braided <WH5688> chains you shall put <WH5414> on the two <WH8147> settings, <WH4865> and put <WH5414> them on the shoulder <WH3802> straps of the ephod <WH646> in its <WH4136> forepart. <WH6440>

You shall make <WH6213> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold, <WH2091> and you shall put <WH7760> them on the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the breastplate, <WH2833> on its edge, <WH8193> which is toward the side <WH5676> of the ephod <WH646> inward. <WH1004>

You shall make <WH6213> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold, <WH2091> and shall put <WH5414> them on the two <WH8147> shoulder <WH3802> straps of the ephod <WH646> underneath, <WH4295> in <WH4136> its forepart, <WH6440> close by <WH5980> its coupling, <WH4225> above <WH4605> the skillfully woven band <WH2805> of the ephod. <WH646>

They shall bind <WH7405> the breastplate <WH2833> by its rings <WH2885> to the rings <WH2885> of the ephod <WH646> with a lace <WH6616> of blue, <WH8504> that it may be on the skillfully woven band <WH2805> of the ephod, <WH646> and that the breastplate <WH2833> may not swing out <WH2118> from the ephod. <WH646>

Aaron <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the breastplate <WH2833> of judgment <WH4941> on his heart, <WH3820> when he goes <WH935> in to the holy <WH6944> place, <WH2146> for a memorial before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> continually. <WH8548>

You shall put <WH5414> in the breastplate <WH2833> of judgment <WH4941> the Urim <WH224> and the Thummim; <WH8550> and they shall be on Aaron <WH175>'s heart, <WH3820> when he goes <WH935> in before <WH6440> Yahweh: <WH3068> and Aaron <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> the judgment <WH4941> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> on his heart <WH3820> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> continually. <WH8548>
"You shall make <WH6213> the robe <WH4598> of the ephod <WH646> all <WH3632> of blue. <WH8504>

It shall have a hole <WH6310> for the head <WH7218> in its midst: <WH8432> it shall have a binding <WH8193> of woven <WH707> work <WH4639> around <WH5439> its hole, <WH6310> as it were the hole <WH6310> of a coat of mail, <WH8473> that it not be torn. <WH7167>

On its hem <WH7757> you shall make <WH6213> pomegranates <WH7416> of blue, <WH8504> and of purple, <WH713> and of scarlet, <WH8144> around <WH5439> its hem; <WH7757> and bells <WH6472> of gold <WH2091> between <WH8432> and around them: <WH5439>
a golden <WH2091> bell <WH6472> and a pomegranate, <WH7416> a golden <WH2091> bell <WH6472> and a pomegranate, <WH7416> around <WH5439> the hem <WH7757> of the robe. <WH4598>

It shall be on Aaron <WH175> to minister: <WH8334> and its sound <WH6963> shall be heard <WH8085> when he goes <WH935> in to the holy <WH6944> place before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> and when he comes <WH3318> out, <WH4191> that he not die.
"You shall make <WH6213> a plate <WH6731> of pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> and engrave <WH6605> on it, <WH6603> like the engravings of a signet, <WH2368> <WH6944> 'HOLY TO YAHWEH. <WH3068>'
You shall put <WH7760> it on a lace <WH6616> of blue, <WH8504> and it shall be on the sash; <WH4701> on the front of the sash it shall be. <WH4701>

It shall be on Aaron <WH175>'s forehead, <WH4696> and Aaron <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the holy things, <WH6944> which the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall make holy <WH6942> in all their holy <WH6944> gifts; <WH4979> and it shall be always <WH8548> on his forehead, <WH4696> that they may be accepted <WH7522> before <WH6440> Yahweh. <WH3068>

You shall weave <WH7660> the coat <WH3801> in checker work of fine linen, <WH8336> and you shall make <WH6213> a turban <WH4701> of fine linen, <WH8336> and you shall make <WH6213> a sash, <WH73> the work of the embroiderer. <WH7551>

"You shall make <WH6213> coats <WH3801> for Aaron <WH175>'s sons, <WH1121> and you shall make <WH6213> sashes <WH73> for them and you shall make <WH6213> headbands <WH4021> for them, <WH3519> for glory and for beauty. <WH8597>

You shall put <WH3847> them on Aaron <WH175> your brother, <WH251> and on his sons <WH1121> with him, <WH4886> and shall anoint them, <WH4390> and consecrate them, <WH6942> and sanctify them, <WH3547> that they may minister to me in the priest's office.
You shall make <WH6213> them linen <WH906> breeches <WH4370> to cover <WH3680> the flesh of their nakedness; <WH1320> from the waist <WH4975> even to the thighs they shall reach: <WH3409>

They shall be on Aaron, <WH175> and on his sons, <WH1121> when they go <WH935> in to the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> or when they come near <WH5066> to the altar <WH4196> to minister <WH8334> in the holy <WH6944> place; <WH5375> that they don't bear iniquity, <WH5771> and die: <WH4191> it shall be a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> to him and to his descendants <WH2233> after him. <WH310>
